mapper.select: SELECT a.CBIE07,a.CBIE02,b.CBWA09,c.CALA08,d.CBSA08,g.CBPA07,h.CALA08,f.CBPB12, f.CBPB15,f.CBPB08,e.CBIF13 FROM CBIE a LEFT JOIN CBWA b on b.CBWA01=a.CBIE09 LEFT JOIN CALA c on c.CALA01=a.CBIE16 LEFT JOIN CBIF e on e.CBIE01=a.CBIE01 LEFT JOIN CBSA d on d.CBSA01=e.CBIF14 LEFT JOIN CBPB f ON f.CBPB01=e.CBIF08 LEFT JOIN CBPA g on g.CBPA01=f.CBPB14 LEFT JOIN CALA h on h.CALA01=f.CBPB10 where a.CBIE01= #{cbie01,jdbcType=INTEGER}
